charges.charge_description: 18:1344 BANK FRAUD; 18:2 Aiding and Abetting(5)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pled guilty. SENTENCE: dft is committed to custody of BOP for 63 months. Supervised Release for a term of 60 months. No fine. $100 SPA. AMENDED JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION (10/2/14): Dft admitted guilt to violations 1-5 of the petition. BOP: Time Served. S/R: 36 months.

charges.charge_description: 18:1028A(a)(1) FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS/Aggravated Identity Theft; 18:2 Aiding and Abetting(6)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pled guilty. SENTENCE: dft is committed to custody of BOP for 24 months, to run consecutively to count 5. No fine. $100 SPA. AMENDED JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION (10/2/14): Dft admitted guilt to violations 1-5 of the petition. BOP: Time Served. S/R: 36 months.

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pled guilty. SENTENCE: dft is committed to custody of BOP for 63 months. Supervised Release for a term of 60 months. No fine. Restitution ordered. $100 SPA. AMENDED JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION (9/10/2014): Dft admitted guilt to violation 7 of the petition. BOP: 2 months; S/R: 24 months; Restitution in the amount of $17,754.99 is reinstated
